item.title: Goldman adds Hershey to its October ‘conviction list.’ Here’s who else made the cut
item.description: Goldman Sachs added these stocks to its "Director's Cut" list of buy-rated companies for October.

item.title: Jefferies downgrades Apple to sell, sees 20% drop from here
item.description: Apple shares are likely to slump as Wall Street's expectations for the company's next iPhone — possibly a foldable — have become too lofty, Jefferies ...

item.title: Buy Freeport-McMoRan on expected recovery from environmental disaster, UBS says
item.description: Freeport-McMoRan is likely to bounce back from a mudslide that forced a halt at its Grasberg mine in Papua, Indonesia, last month, according to UBS.

item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Broadcom, Tesla, Netflix, Ferrari, Johnson & Johnson, Coinbase and more
item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Johnson & Johnson is a buy as drug sales continue to improve, Wells Fargo says
item.description: The bank upgraded the pharma giant to overweight from equal weight.
